about_the_game:
This Downloadable Content Pack includes the highly detailed CSX GE B30-7 model for use in the Trainz Simulator franchise games.

Features Include:
  • Night Lighting
  • Ditch Lights
  • Auto Running Numbers
  • Fan Animation
detailed_description:
This Downloadable Content Pack includes the highly detailed CSX GE B30-7 model for use in the Trainz Simulator franchise games.

  • Processor: Intel i5 2Ghz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon Pro 555 with 1GB VRAM supporting OpenGL 3.3
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
